        public java.lang.String print(java.util.Vector<Entidade> map,
                              boolean[] endFlag)
        Method to print the Entidade in the board.
        Parameters:
        map - Vector of Entidade's to store the entidades in the game.

        Returns:

      • printEntidade

        private boolean printEntidade(int x,
                              int y,
                              java.util.Vector<Entidade> map,
                              boolean[] endFlag,
                              java.lang.String[] output)
        Method responsible for printing an Entidade and setting the end game flag
        Parameters:
        x - Board x coordinate.
        y - Board y coordinate.
        map - Vector of game Entidade's.
        endFlag - The flag to verify if the game ended.
        output - String that represents the board.
        Returns:
        True if an Entidade was printed, false otherwise.

      • refresh

        public char refresh(Entidade entidade,
                    char dir)
        Method that updates the board and modifies the parameters accordingly.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate to refresh the board.
        y - y coordinate to refresh the board.
        dir - direction in which the Entidade moved.
        tag - Entidade filed to be updated.
        current - Entidade field to be updated.
        Returns:
        Char that is the next current field to be set in Entidade.
